context.arch.intelligibility.presenters
Class TablePanelPresenter

java.lang.Object
  context.arch.intelligibility.presenters.Presenter<javax.swing.JPanel>
      context.arch.intelligibility.presenters.TablePanelPresenter
Direct Known Subclasses:
TypePanelPresenter
public class TablePanelPresenter
extends Presenter<javax.swing.JPanel>

Renders explanations into a JPanel. It only considers the structure of the explanation and not the context or question. It requires supplied explanations to be in DNF.

Returns:

enhanceTable

protected void enhanceTable(TablePanelPresenter.ExplanationTable table)
This assumes that most explanations are rendered in tables, and specifically in table cells. The default behavior is to add tooltips to the cells. Subclasses can enhance further, e.g. by supporting right-click popups to ask for explanations.

Parameters:
comp - the table cell component to enhance
table -
rowIndex -
vColIndex -
